name: Void Hunger
description:
Void Hunger is a WG-themed fantasy RPG full of cute girls and adventure.

(Work in progress) 

Elaine, a rather average girl, dreams of adventure but never leaves her town. All changes when one day, she discovers an amulet and summons Ulliel, a void goddess rather fond of human food. The unlikely pair will discover a new world while learning the ropes of adventurer life.

Embark on a journey in a world full of friends, foes and food! Play your way till the darkest mysteries of this land.
